description: This file defines an API client for making HTTP requests (GET and POST) to a backend server, with token management and URL normalization, and includes custom exception handling.

classes.name: ApiClient
classes.description: A client for performing HTTP requests to a backend API, managing tokens, and constructing request URLs.

classes.name: ApiException
classes.description: Custom exception class for handling API errors.

methods.name: setToken
methods.description: Updates the authentication token used in request headers.

methods.name: _headers
methods.description: Constructs HTTP headers, including authorization if token is set.

methods.name: _uri
methods.description: Builds and normalizes the full request URI with optional query parameters.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Performs an HTTP GET request to the specified path with optional query parameters and headers.

methods.name: post
methods.description: Performs an HTTP POST request to the specified path with an optional body and headers.

methods.name: _throwIfError
methods.description: Throws an ApiException if the HTTP response indicates an error (status code >= 400).
